Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: tax impact from issuance of common stock
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of corporate related long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
Repayment of Debt: net borrowings payments on premium financing debt facility
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): business combination contingent consideration arrangements change in amount of contingent consideration liability1
change in estimated acquisition earnout payables
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
payments to acquire businesses net of cash and restricted cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from loans receivable
payments for proceeds from settlements of terminated interest rate swaps
net proceeds from sales of operations

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in premiums and fee receivable
net change in accrued compensation and other accrued liabilities
net change in accrued compensation and other current liabilities
net change in fees receivable unearned fees
Deferred Income Taxes: increase decrease in deferred income taxes
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
Other Non-Cash Items: foreign currency transaction gain before tax
foreign currency transaction gain loss before tax
foreign currency transaction gain loss unrealized
gains losses on extinguishment of debt related to operating activities
other non cash items related to discontinued operations
Stock-Based Compensation: amortization of deferred compensation and restricted stock

__unmapped__: net change in fiduciary assets and liabilities
